attributes.action: Withdraw resettlement payments for all the Mp's who are standing down over the expenses scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Mp's who are standing down for abusing the expenses system are in line to receive resettlement payments ranging from 32,000 pound to 65,000 pound. The funding for these payments will yet again be taken from us the tax payer. Naming and shaming these Mp's is not enough by far, they should now be stripped of any future payments and pensions they may be entitled to, as they have abused their position of trust.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
